name: morning-briefing
prompt: Morning market briefing. Run: 1) `botcore get_market_prices` 2) `botcore get_market_overview` 3) `botcore get_paper_open_trades`. Create concise briefing with prices, 24h changes, open positions. Keep under 1000 chars. Send to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the briefing. Do NOT skip sending to Telegram.
